mapper.select: SELECT r.id FROM (SELECT @rownum := @rownum+1 AS ROWNO, a.* FROM (select stadiumName,id, DATE_FORMAT(created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAT FROM stadium INNER join(SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R ORDER BY stadiumName) a ) r WHERE ROWNO=#{ROWNO}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT @rownum := @rownum+1 AS ROWNO, a.* FROM (select stadiumName,id, DATE_FORMAT(created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAT FROM stadium INNER join(SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R ORDER BY stadiumName) a ) r WHERE ROWNO=#{ROWNO}

mapper.update: UPDATE stadium SET stadiumName=#{stadiumName} WHERE id=#{ROWNO}
